description:
I think having a "Make foo my default search engine" checkbox (initially
unchecked) in the addSearchEngine dialog would encourage more search engines to
give users Sherlock plugins from their sites.  For example, Google might put
"Make Google your default search engine" on their home page for Mozilla users
like it puts "Make Google Your Homepage!" for IE users.
summary: Add "Make foo my default search engine" to addSearchEngine dialog
